name: Donna Chimera
offering: Business Coaching, Business Consulting, Group Coaching, Intuition Coaching, Public Speaking, Spiritual Coaching
what_you_do: I am an intuitive personal and business coach who helps clients create a life they can love living.
who_you_serve: I am hired by conscious professionals and visionary business owners to create and sustain a balanced life while they make a positive difference in the world.
business_focus: I use accelerative techniques to help clients overcome obstacles, transform their mindset, and manifest a fulfilling lifestyle.
service_provided: personal coaching, business coaching, transformational bodywork
